transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yeah, hello. Good afternoon, ma'am. This is Shruti from India Mart head office, Noida.
Customer: Uh, yes. Hi, Shruti. Can I please, can I please call me back in half an hour? Actually, I was having lunch.
Executive: Oh, sure. Please carry on. I'll call you by three then.
Customer: Yeah, please, please make sure to call me. Okay.
Executive: Sure, sure. I'll I'll surely call you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Requested a callback in half an hour.



Resolution:

- Agreed to call back by 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- callback, lunch, timing
